subject: Aw: Order #SSN1632 confirmed
description_text:
Hello, there was an update on your homepage regarding the control boxes. is it possible to update my order and change the control box to the "Pro X Ultra Pedal Control Box"? I would like to use the VAM Pro motors with it! Many thanks in advance! Best Regards Ingo Baron Am 03.06.25, 22:40 schrieb SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>: 








 
 
 
 Thank you for your purchase!
 

 
 
 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN1632
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Thank you for your purchase!

conversations.body_text: Hi Ingo Baron,  Are you currently using the Pro Plus or ProX pedal? I’ll check your order to see if there might be a mismatch with the control box version.

Hello, I am not using any of the pedals as I would like to use the haptic motors with my own pedals. But as it written on your page the vamp pro motors have less intensity with the pro plus than the Pro X. that's why I would like to receive the pro X box. Thanks in advance I. Baron Am 16.06.25, 04:45 schrieb "service@simsonn.com"

Hi Ingo Baron,    The Pro X can only make the Vam Pro vibrate in one direction, and less intensity than the Pro X Ultra. but the Plus X is the same with Ultra, and both it and the Pro X Ultra support the haptic motor well, so no worries there.

Hi, if the intensity is higher and vam pro can vibrate in two directions, seems better. if the price of the control boxes is the same, I would love to have the higher intensity and better vibration if possible. the pro x ultra box just was not available to choose when I did the order. Am 17.06.25, 04:37 schrieb "service@simsonn.com"

Hi Ingo Baron,     The price being the same is our way of accommodating customers who have previously purchased the Pro X, which is actually more expensive. If you don't have a Pro X, the Plus X control box works the same.
Hi, okay, understood. when is the order going to be shipped? Am 17.06.25, 12:14 schrieb "service@simsonn.com"
